content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 07 Oct 2018In general (non-VC), what is an acceptable brokerage fee?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Loh Tat TianLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 12 Nov 2018I have personally scanned through the basic trading account for all companies. Most of them have brokerage at $25.00 and minimum commission of 0.275%. The clearing fee etc should be the same for all.However, if you are using cash up-front account (deposit cash into account before buying the stock), then its better to go for DBS vickers (due to low brokerage 0.12% commission and minimum $10).You may also see the following article https://blog.seedly.sg/the-ultimate-cheatsheet-cheapest-stock-brokerage-in-singapore/0 comments0
